attributes.review:
i’m not a part of the whole “gen z” thing, i am a trump supporter. a proud one. i hold cheetos in a very high regard 🧚‍♀️🥰. however, i was so surprised after downloading this app. it’s definetly not what i expected. it was so terrible. repulsive. disgOStanG. my phone was flooded with pictures of kanye westerfield 🙀🙀 and i started getting texts from joey bydin, HIS PERSONAL NUMBER. i saw his absurd plans for the country, such as combatting coronavirus. sleepy joe doesn’t know that cases would be reduced once we stop testing 🙈.  i don’t like seeing this fake news, especially on my phone 🛑🛑. a little while later, while i was walking my fish, MY PHONE BEGAN TO VIBRATE‼️ my screen was all black and guess who i saw? lil huddy. nevertheless, i was convinced that crooked hillery hacked my phone. i decided to go to sleep but a couple hours my phone began to decombust. SAD. i had to buy a new one. anyway, i would like to end off with a tribute to barron and donald trump. 

i miss the old trùmp, straight from the go trump🤑
chop up the soul trump, set on his goal trump
i hate the new trumpe, the bad mood trümp
the always rude trumpe, spaz in the news trûmP
i miss the sweet trump, chop up the beats trump
i gotta say, at that time i’d like to meet trump 

NO MALARKEY 😼😼

attributes.review:
I downloaded it to keep up to date with what our president does but instead of giving me information, it was TAKING my information. When the first thing I had to do to enter the app was give my email, I thought nothing of it. Normal app things, right? WRONG! Now, I get nothing but Russian Spam to my email and have noticed my phone activating and scrolling through apps without me doing anything!!! If you don't want China stealing your info and getting Russian spam, stay away from this app! It's obviously a fake used to destroy Trump's image!!!
I'm so scared that I'll have to get a new phone after all the malware this app has probably put on my phone! Stay safe guys!
attributes.title: PLEASE don't get this app
